description:
After fresh install it through a java.lang.IllegalStateException, because the process cannot write in /usr/share/dbeaver/workspace/.metadata.

Create the "workspace" directory with 777 permissions.
Them it works perfect.
summary: Create directory to make it working - Ubuntu 19.04

description: not working, prompt and close
A terminal windows pops up but crashes instantly.
Not working on ubuntu 18

You need java 8 or openjdk java 8 version installed. 

Then:
wget -O - https://dbeaver.io/debs/dbeaver.gpg.key | sudo apt-key add -
echo "deb https://dbeaver.io/debs/dbeaver-ce /" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/dbeaver.list

sudo apt update
sudo apt install dbeaver-ce

Then lookup your icon in -show applications-

All the credits from here: https://websiteforstudents.com/install-and-configure-dbeaver-on-ubuntu-16-04-18-04/
summary: Works on 19.4 but not by this installation

This is not the first application, and probably not the last, that fail to start after it has been "snapified".

description: Not Working on Ubuntu 19
showing terminal and closing

It don't start, so I must get it (version 6.14) from dbeavrio:
wget -O - https://dbeaver.io/debs/dbeaver.gpg.key | sudo apt-key add -
echo "deb https://dbeaver.io/debs/dbeaver-ce /" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/dbeaver.list
sudo apt update 
sudo apt install dbeaver-ce

It don't come with JDBC drivers but I manually install them and now all is working.

Ubuntu 18.04:

Para instalarlo primero se debe instalar java.
Primero: 	
	sudo apt update
Luego: 
 	sudo apt install default-jre
	sudo apt install default-jdk

Para comprobar instalacion de java:

java -version
Con la actualización del día 18 de diciembre para la versión 6.3 ya se puede instalar y ejecutar sin problemas.
Todo funciona de maravilla!!

El programa funciona en su totalidad,lo tengo trabajando con MSSQL y MongoDB, obviamente con su respectivos Jars para sus conexxiones, por que end efinitiva la version Comunity no trae Jars para bases de datos NoSql.

All is good !

I used it to migrate the data between big (~200Gb) SQLite and Firebird databases. The ease of use, pretty intuitive UI, but still functional even in Community Edition

But as mentioned above for big mem use there are no out-of-box options for increasing application memory (-Xm* arguments)

В одном приложении поддерживается SQLIte, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, ClickHouse! Удобный интерфейс, при редактировании данных в таблицах показывает связи как Master-Detail и дает возможность выбирать подчиненные записи из словаря.
summary: Лучшее приложение, которое я встречал для работы с различными СУБД
